para.text: Assistance available pursuant to this subchapter is limited to a one-time loan of up to $15,000 with a maximum 20-year amortized term.
The interest rate shall be 3%, unless otherwise provided by the Mayor by rulemaking.
The Mayor shall establish underwriting guidelines, including loan amounts and repayment terms, by rulemaking.

annotations.annotation: D.C. Law 13-91 validated a previously made technical amendment in subsec. (a).
